main.name: Yewbdar Abera
main.bio: My name is Yewbdar, I'm a Front-End Developer with over 5 years of experience building responsive, user-friendly web apps using React, JavaScript, and modern UI tools. I recently worked on financial tools at US Bank and built a full-stack portfolio project to sharpen my skills. I'm passionate about clean code, performance, and creating great user experiences.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

resume.skillmessage: Passionate about translating designs and wireframes into high-quality code. Build a business-critical web-based application using core technologies

testimonials.text: I have had the pleasure of working with Yewbdar on a CMS application for a restaurant with NodeJS, Sequelize, and Handlebars. Yewbdar initially came off as a coy individual, but I was fortunate to learn that she is so much more than that within a team. Yewbdar is not only knowledgeable, but very clever, hardworking, and vocal, and provided quick solutions and work-arounds in the tight timeline we had with this ambitious project. She is an excellent team member, always communicating clearly with the rest of the team and swarming in different areas of the application: from database design and unit tests, to backend business logic and frontend's model view. For our CMS project, she was also heavily involved in improving and breaking down tasks distributed among team members via our Kanban board, helping us journey towards success. I would recommend Yewbdar to any company looking to include a highly valuable asset to their development team, and I hope to work with her again in the future.

That Yewbdar Abera must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired her yet. Hey you, you should hire her, she may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that she will be one of your best developers in no time!
